content:
Prev: Clorinda and Timothy again Up: Family and Friends Next: Daniel, I

Chaz



Charlie and Jana got themselves a nice new digital camera (Fuji 3800)
for Christmas, so of course we were comparing cameras. Charlie saw the
camera lens pointing his way and struck this formal pose.
Taken Sunday, December 29, 2002, 08:38:03pm.  Original image size: 1812x2718, 7.2Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/50s @ F2.8, ISO 1000, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 125mm (200mm equiv)
FVU WP, Sha0, DEC +0.3, PS7 Crop, D60ISOR 800 low, USM 150:2:5, Levels G 0:0.95:255
